kz_bhop_minimal is a huge kz map for advanced kz players. 
The map have 7 different colors and the difficulty is increasing progressivly.

This map also have a short bhop bonus that start on the top of the giant cyan room.

Special thanks to the testers and Disrevoid who allowed me to test the map few times on his test server.

Hey, i will stop the game soon and decided to create kz_bhop_m4dara before. 

Map is for medium/advanced player, its not long, but some jumps or bhop are hard.

Hope you like, fixed all the bugs, thx to people who test the map.

Have fun

kz\_bhop\_lucid
------------------

I have been working on this map for over 6 months now, with breaks of course. I decided to make a map which uses aspects of the design of kz\_synergy\_x from 1.6 because I really liked it and that's what it has become. 

### This map features:

- a varying bunnyhop and climbing journey
- 4 levels with increasing difficulty
- 1 unique bonus level
- a longjump room with jumps from 240 to 272
- a relaxing song at the end of the bonus
- custom particles
- much fun

### Songs:
- start: [John Murphy - Surface Of The Sun](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nFvX1a7Yxh4 "link2")
- end: [Kaj. - Journey](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lRe9UmpOWys "link1")


I hope you will all like it and enjoy playing this map. Feel free to criticise, I am looking forward for every critique, especially from expirienced mappers. 

Furthermore I want to thank [pLANE](http://steamcommunity.com/id/plane/ "link3") again, who made this map release possible.

Have fun while hopping,

keyuu

Short speed run map, no prespeed.

Map was originally designed to be a large LJ practice map, but I decided to add a bhop course serving as a short preview of my upcoming map, bhop badges2, and is made up of a couple stages from it plus a few bonus features (huge lj section + bhop wars) that won't be able to fit into the main map.

Made for no scout, 100 tick, 300 fps, no cheats, normal gameplay, which is rare these days.

Hi guys, 

Here is my new map, it's made up of 8 parts with increasing difficulty. It starts easy, but gets progressively harder. There is a bonus zone, and a longjump zone. I tried to make this map original with some new kind of levels and varied decorations. I made it with a dedication to my friend koryouz.
I worked on this map for a very long time, and hope you enjoy it. :) 

You will find 2 versions of the map in the download, the normal one, and a version without ladderjumps for those who don't like it.

Note : you may have a big fps drop at green part, since the logic\_timer is doing shit when you're not in that part...

Good luck and have fun!   
                        
PS : I apologize for those overused textures, but I didn't feel as though any other design would appropriately fit into these levels.    
                     
PPS : For some reason, sometimes a few particle systems may not spawn...

so it's here. cant count the hours i acctually put into this map over the last couple of weeks but its done!
I don't even know what to write here any more, its alot of bhop/climb/lj, 220 to 266 (240 and higher are skippable with a 36 sec penalty) the climb isnt SUPER hard but it's challenging, blue blocks are 1hop, green are not triggered because i got no ent data left to spare but it's unLJable and meant to be bhopped. uncheatable anti pre everywhere and some other cool stuff!

thanks to everyone who helped me, everyone who tested and acer + george for letting me use their server for testing.

edit: i should probably have written that this map is made with trying to get more people into kz/lj in mind, both auto and legit players
Probably my best map.

scroll never dies
KZ map I've been working on for a while now. It was supposed to be pretty easy but turned out to be a bit more difficult, so its probably a good challenge for medium players.

This is a port of the deathrun/kz/bhop map deathrun_bhopz_remake for 1.6.

This map is a little challenging and heavily designed for scroll, all deathrun elements of the original map were stripped, and certain areas that feel cramped are done so on purpose to add a sense of difficulty.

The original map used lights.rad and radiating surface lights which had to be swapped with default lights.

This map was originally uploaded to cosy-climbing.net but was removed subsequently because it was deemed "impossible". I noticed that and took the liberty to make the map entirely possible, while removing some aspects of the original detail of the map, and adding extra blocks here and there. The map was made by "nohomo" on cosy-climbing.net, his profile can be found here.
https://cosy-climbing.net//user.php?id.13078

Tier 4/6, est completion time 2:00~

Enjoy (or don't)

a short kz_bhop map that's enjoyable for both beginners and experienced players

The general idea was having an abandoned concrete course in the desert, without any indoor parts.

I'd say the overall difficulty of the map is easy, but from what I've seen during testing it's pretty fun to speedrun still.
Designed around 100 tick 300fps scroll 100 air accelerate 250 runspeed gameplay, although it's possible on 66 tick and the map shouldn't break too hard if it's played on auto.

Pretty much a kz map, there's no triggers, but I don't actually play kz on source and I intended auto players to be able to do this map too so it's kz_bhop_. It has no triggers, but the level design allows you to have some fuck ups without it completely destroying your run. The tip is there for people who don't have much mouse pad space, as it requires less room to do that ladder strafe backwards than forwards. The map is around 50 seconds to a minute long on scroll.


Please tell me if there's any issues, and enjoy!

Hey guys, this is my first map , hope you enjoy it.

kz_bhop_cube is inspired by xc_qube and it is intended to be played on legit normal difficulty 100 tick servers that force sv_airaccelerate 100, fps_max 300, sv_gravity 800 and no scout.

It is a medium difficulty map which comprises three rooms with the same difficulties.
It is short map because the decoration which need a lot of blocks.
To make the gameplay more interesting , i added checkpoints and gravity triggers for anti-prespeed. I didn't ask badges for his gravity triggers because I knew he was going to make a prefab of it.

EDIT : I finished adjusting all triggers ,I think this is the latest version,if you find any bugs or scs contact me. LAST VERSION '23/11/2013'
Thank to reupload it on your server and not to keep older versions.
 
Music : Free Background Music 12: Dreams (120 bpm)

_aChangeLog.text: Stripper CFG to correct hit box issues due to valve update

_sText:
Here it is. Badges3 One jump strafe based gameplay made for legit normal settings (that means stamina scroll for the uninitiated). It is intended to be played on 100 tick, sv_airaccelerate 100, fps_max 300, sv_gravity 800 and no scout / 250 run speed. To experience the map how it was meant to be played, visit _strafe for a list of legit normal servers. Badges3 contains an intricate system of over 150 filters and thousands of triggers which control the maps built in checkpoint system and determine whether or not you have met the requirements needed to pass each stage. Skipping certain parts of the map with noclip, low gravity, sever side checkpoints, or maybe even easy settings may cause parts of the map to be impossible. Badges3 was designed around the limitations of normal legit gameplay, you will likely experience bugs on any other setting. The checkpoint system will only save you from minor fails, it won't always save you if you fall back too many stages. Due to the restrictions of the source engine, the checkpoint system is not perfect, to be certain you have triggered each checkpoint correctly, try to trigger it again before continuing. I've made it so each checkpoint spams its filter output for a second, but sometimes this still doesn't work since you may also be getting spammed with filter inputs from other entities. No one experienced any problems with the system in testing, but it is still possible there may be bugs in very rare cases. Badges3 features a number of new control systems. It is the first bhop map (and maybe even first map period, I'm not too sure) to feature a perfectly working Non-Linear Multi-Stage Multiplayer Course Completion System™ that resets on respawn. I've also created a new anti prespeed and 1 jump system designed specifically for this map which now incorporates the checkpoint system and the requirement to pass each stage system thingy. The stages that require you to reach a certain spot before opening a door for you are filtered, so they only work for the client who triggered it, but are displayed server side. This may cause confusion but It's unlikely two players will be at the same place at once. If this is the case, use your head. If one player triggers the event while the event is happening for another player, it still works, it just doesn't show it. Alternatively, wait 10 seconds for it to reset. Badges3 was created with the use of HDR in mind. It looks best when played with HDR turned on. Playing this map with HDR turned off will cause inconsistency in lighting. For optimal visual experience, turn on HDR by going to Options > Video > Advanced and selecting 'Full' under High Dynamic Range. Then reconnect to the server. Incase you aren't sure, if the first stage is yellow, HDR is on, if it's orange, HDR is off. Badges3 contains a massive amount of particle systems to help guide you through the map. If you cannot see these particles, fix the problem. It also contains a number of material proxies that people with low texture settings won't be able to see. Server admins, please put the start and end zones in the top halves of the rooms indicated. Here is a picture and another picture. Server players, if the start or end zones are in the wrong spot, please tell the admins they are morons. This should be obvious, but after seeing how many servers got it wrong in badges2, nothing surprises me.

2019 UPDATE - Trigger fix

A few years ago, an update to CSS changed the way hit boxes function which caused problems with some of the triggers in this map. While this issue has been addressed on some servers, other servers with the stripper plugin installed can now use the cfg in the link below to fix these problems.

Thanks to gibe, nyu, remi and dwsdfgxcvad who all either helped or worked on different versions of this.

https://steamcommunity.com/groups/_strafe#announcements/detail/1631902387970626374

_sText: Short map, meant to be played on legit/scroll settings.

The second version of the map with better gameplay and some issues surrounding the over-usage of the ugly brown blocks fixed. I released as a separate map because the changes are quite drastic and the original was 4 months ago. 


I would've made something else to put in the background badges but nothing looked good to me, and I salvaged this off mediafire with a decompile anyway so I'm just posting it. Enjoy!

A short kz bhop map with dev textures I made in 2 days. Don't hate me for dev textures please, also tell me if there's any major skips or bugs.


Auto length: around 1 minute

400 velocity cap scroll: around 2 minutes

_aChangeLog.text: Finally had the time to come back to this map and tweak a few things
Re-added the final stage.
Added a few new checkpoints throughout the map.
Fixed a big map skip (Thanks Nyu, Mjau and Madara)
And a few small changes you might not even notice

_sText:
Like the name implies, this is a hard map, or at least was the initial idea.
Its kinda not long enough 'cause I hit some engine limits, but it's still pretty darn long.

It includes everything you might hate like:

  • SingleHop system
  • Forced jump stats
  • Forced perf bhops
  • Ladders
  • Anti pre speed
  • NoDuck longjumps
  • SlowMotion longjumps
  • Boosters!
  • Surf ?????
  • Dev Textures
  • "Where am I suposed to go?" bonus
  • Mandatory longjump room
  • Generic particle system
  • And a lot more!

There's also a Minigame room behind the start zone, with 4 diferent games + 1v1 bhop track.
  • Air Hockey
  • Flappy Birb
  • Connect 4
  • Tic-Tac-Toe

The first two are disabled by default because they both use game_ui's to function, and if you don't know already these entities can crash dedicated servers If the user disconect while using it. So, for safety I had to disable them OnMapSpawn. If you want to enable those games, make sure your server has the game_ui fix by GoD-Tony and use this stripper config:

;; Enable Minigames
filter:
{
	"targetname" "ah_disable"
}


;; Patch first portal skip(Where you can climb the top of it)
add:
{
	"model" "*821"
	"origin" "2557 -10449.4 4712"
	"target" "end_portal1_tp1"
	"classname" "trigger_teleport"
	"StartDisabled" "0"
	"spawnflags" "1"
}

;; and last portal skip(where you can bhop inside the frame and skip the whole final stage).
add:
{
	"model" "*821"
	"origin" "-11696 3552 624"
	"target" "lab_tp1"
	"filtername" "ft_cp1"
	"classname" "trigger_teleport"
	"StartDisabled" "0"
	"spawnflags" "1"
}


Zones are already pre-set if you're using shavit's bhoptimer.
Textures are a mix of default dev textures, my own and some remakes/edits from yonkoma.
This is clearly inspired by maps like Yonkoma and Benchmark, but with my own twist to it.
You can find the music list in the main hub, in the pink side of the room.
Music volume is also controled using the ingame music slider (snd_musicvolume 0)
BSP file is repacked with bspzip to save filesize.
Original .vmf included
